DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate association pre treatment pain intensity central pain mechanism effect 8-week treatment NSAIDs patient knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed Knee Ostoarthritis Current ulcer diagnose endoscope Asthma allergic reaction NSIADs Kidney disease Myocardial infarction within last six month Severe hyper tension ( systolic ≥180mmHg , diastolic ≥110mmHg ) Severe thrombocytopenia ( thrombocyst count < 50x10^9/l ) Insufficience lever kidney function
